dk.itst.oiosaml.common
Class SAMLUtil

java.lang.Object
  dk.itst.oiosaml.common.SAMLUtil

public class SAMLUtil
extends Object

Class with utility methods for creating SAML objects. Before accessing any of the methods in this class, DefaultBootstrap.bootstrap() must have been run at some point. If this has not been done, a NullPointerException will happen inside OpenSAML.

buildXMLObject

public static <T extends org.opensaml.xml.XMLObject> T buildXMLObject(Class<T> type)
Build a new empty object of the requested type. The requested type must have a DEFAULT_ELEMENT_NAME attribute describing the element type as a QName.

Type Parameters:
T - SAML Object type

decodeDiscoveryValue

public static String[] decodeDiscoveryValue(String value)
Decode the value of a _saml_idp discovery value.

Parameters:
value - A string of entityIds encoded with base64 and separated by space.
Returns:
A list of decoded values. Never null.

Get the first element of a specific type from a parent element.

Parameters:
obj - The parent element. If this is null, null is returned.
type - The type to retrieve.
Returns:
The first element, or null if no elements were found.
